text: Baidu PostBar is a communication platform tied to search results operated by the Chinese search engine company, Baidu
Facebook is the social networking service operated by Facebook Inc.
VKontakte is an online social media and social networking service based in St Petersburg, owned by the Russian internet company Mail.Ru since 2014.
Twitter is an online news and social networking service where users post and interact with "tweets," restricted to 140 characters.
Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking service owned by Yahoo! since 2013. The service allows users to post multimedia and other content to a short-form blog.
Qzone is a social networking service created by Tencent Holding Limited in 2005. It allows users to write blogs, keep diaries, send photos, listen to music, and watch videos.
